[console_scripts]
prepuller = rubin_jupyter_utils.hub.scanrepo:prepullerstandalone
reaper = rubin_jupyter_utils.hub.scanrepo:reaperstandalone
scanrepo = rubin_jupyter_utils.hub.scanrepo:standalone

[jupyterhub.authenticators]

[jupyterhub.spawners]
